description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(488).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,486,0,-1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,11,485,5346]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 486*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 27 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
